about_the_game:
Game Introduction

"A simple driving/action game that finds and destroys enemies.

A new operation method that has never been seen before will delight your hands.
In reality, you don't have to pay expensive money to buy equipment.
In reality, you don't even need a lot of space.
“Everything is ready.”

Now, save the underworld occupied by robots with your own hands.

Challenge yourself to a new record.

Feature

-The H-Shifter is in the game.
-Gear changes via clutch and brake and accelerator.
-The clutch is very important.

- The "Training Zone" is not available in the Demo version.
- When you start the game, you enter the "Challenge Zone" right away.
- You can only kill up to 10 enemies in the Demo version.
- There is no lobby where you can check your game records in the Demo version.
- In the Demo version, the gear control section is overwritten with simple operation methods.

"Challenge Zone"
-The map and enemy locations change every time you start a new game.
-You can save and exit the game at any time and continue playing.
-There is a gas station, repair shop, weapon shop, and item shop.
-In the challenge zone, the time for killing 50 enemies is recorded and ranked. Try to shorten the record.

-In addition, you can use various tactics by pressing various buttons.

"Training Zone"
-There is a training zone where you can practice while watching the friendly explanation.
-In the training zone, items, armor, and fuel are provided infinitely.
-In the training zone, the time is not recorded, so you can practice comfortably. Practice until you are fully adapted.

Game Tip

When on a store elevator, disarm all weapons and special functions and turn off the engine.
